languages.text: {n}Молодой Эвейн Винтерскейл смотрит на вас с торжественным видом.{/n} "Друг мой, ты был{mf||а} рядом каждый раз, когда я... нет, когда моя династия нуждалась в поддержке мудрого союзника. Знай, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}это не будет забыто{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Молодой Эвейн Винтерскейл смотрит на вас с торжественным видом.{/n} "Друг мой, ты был{mf||а} рядом каждый раз, когда я... нет, когда моя династия нуждалась в поддержке мудрого союзника. Наконец настал тот день, когда пришла и моя очередь протянуть руку помощи".
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой Эвейн Винтерскейл смотрит на вас с торжественным видом.{/n} "Друг мой, ты был{mf||а} рядом каждый раз, когда я... нет, когда моя династия нуждалась в поддержке мудрого союзника. Знай, что {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}это не будет забыто{/d}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty needed a wise ally's support. And the day has finally come when it is my turn to extend a helping hand."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

traits.locale_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty needed a wise ally's support. And the day has finally come when it is my turn to extend a helping hand."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

traits.locale_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know this will always be appreciated."

traits.locale_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}年轻的艾维尼·温特斯凯尔以庄重的表情看着你。{/n}“我的盟友，每当我……不，每当我的王朝需要明智的盟友时，您总会站在我们身边。我希望亲口告诉您，我{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}永远不会忘记您的恩情{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}年轻的艾维尼·温特斯凯尔以庄重的表情看着你。{/n}“我的盟友，每当我……不，每当我的王朝需要明智的盟友时，您总会站在我们身边。我希望亲口告诉您，我永远感激您的恩情。”
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Der junge Evayne Winterzunder blickt dich mit ernster Miene an.{/n} "{mf|Mein Freund|Meine liebe Freundin}, Ihr wart immer an meiner Seite, wenn ich ... nein, wenn meine Dynastie auf die Unterstützung eines weisen Verbündeten angewiesen war. Lasst Euch gesagt sein, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}dass wir das nie vergessen werden{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der junge Evayne Winterzunder blickt dich mit ernster Miene an.{/n} "{mf|Mein Freund|Meine liebe Freundin}, Ihr wart immer an meiner Seite, wenn ich ... nein, wenn meine Dynastie auf die Unterstützung eines weisen Verbündeten angewiesen war. Lasst Euch gesagt sein, dass wir dafür ewig dankbar sein werden."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}El joven Evayne Winterscale te mira con expresión solemne.{/n} «{mf|Amigo mío|Amiga mía}, ha estado usted a mi lado cada vez que yo... no, cada vez que mi dinastía ha necesitado el apoyo de un aliado sabio. Sepa que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}nunca olvidaremos esto{/d}».
languages.original_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El joven Evayne Winterscale te mira con expresión solemne.{/n} «{mf|Amigo mío|Amiga mía}, ha estado usted a mi lado cada vez que yo... no, cada vez que mi dinastía ha necesitado el apoyo de un aliado sabio. Cuenta usted con nuestra eterna gratitud».
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Le jeune Evayne Winterscale vous regarde d'un air solennel.{/n} « Mon {mf|ami|amie}, vous qui avez été à mes côtés quand je... non, quand ma dynastie a eu besoin du soutien d'un allié avisé... Sachez que {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}votre aide ne sera jamais oubliée{/d}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le jeune Evayne Winterscale vous regarde d'un air solennel.{/n} « Mon {mf|ami|amie}, vous qui avez été à mes côtés quand je... non, quand ma dynastie a eu besoin du soutien d'un allié avisé... Sachez que nous vous serons toujours reconnaissants de votre aide. »
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}若きエヴァイン・ウィンタースケールは厳粛な表情であなたを見つめる。{/n}「我が友よ、あなたは俺が…いや、我が王朝が賢明な同盟者からの支援を必要とする時はいつでも、俺の側にいてくれた。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}この恩は、いつまでも忘れない{/d}」
languages.original_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}若きエヴァイン・ウィンタースケールは厳粛な表情であなたを見つめる。{/n}「我が友よ、あなたは俺が…いや、我が王朝が賢明な同盟者からの支援を必要とする時はいつでも、俺の側にいてくれた。{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}この恩は、いつまでも忘れない{/d}」
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final

languages.text: {n}Genç Evayne Winterscale, sana ciddiyetle bakıyor.{/n} "Dostum, ben... Yani hanedanlığım, bilge bir dostun desteğine ne zaman ihtiyaç duysa yanımızda oldun. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}Bunu asla unutmayacağız{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Young Evayne Winterscale looks at you with a solemn expression.{/n} "My friend, you have been by my side whenever I... no, whenever my dynasty has needed support from a wise ally. Please know {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}this will never be forgotten{/d}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Genç Evayne Winterscale, sana ciddiyetle bakıyor.{/n} "Dostum, sen her zaman... Yok, hanedanlığım bilge bir dostun desteğine her ihtiyaç duyduğunda yanımda oldun. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_EvayneIsAlly}Bunu asla unutmayacağım{/d}."
traits.speaker: ArthurWinterscale_Final
